EmailTemplate.name: DPS- Racing Protection with DuPont ™ Nomex®
EmailTemplate.subject: Racing Protection with DuPont ™ Nomex®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Racing Protection with DuPont ™ Nomex®.
Science of Racing, that's where the science of DuPont comes in. We offer some miraculous products and technologies that are in and on your car.
To find out more, visit our Dupont™ website.
Please copy the following web address into your web browser.
http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/personal-protective-equipment/thermal-protective/brands/nomex/products/nomex-racing-protection.html
http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/personal-protective-equipment/thermal-protective/uses-and-applications/racing-suits.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
